In this sinful world, being the archbishop is no easy task.
You, yourself, are not perfect, but at least you try to favor the word of God.
But as the archbishop, you have to make sure the others favor it as well!
as your loyal exorcist who will reveal the magic wielders and
as your trusted puritan fanatic who will reveal the adulterers.
Your goal is to make sure that they succeed so that you may inact 'suitable' measures for those revealed to be the greatest sinners among us.
